title: Christopher Junior
description:
Having accidentally placed himself in a compromising situation, Christopher Jedbury, Jr. is forced to marry a woman without ever seeing her. When his father finds out about the marriage he turns Christopher out and sends him to India to work as a lowly clerk in his trading company offices there. The matter of Christopher’s wife becomes complicated when he meets the lovely Dora and asks his lawyer friend to find the mystery bride in order to dissolve the marriage. The plot takes a turn when the wife cannot be found anywhere and Dora reveals she has a secret of her own! (Summary by Jenn Broda)

Cast List:
Christopher Jedbury, Sr. (an East Indian Merchant): Alan Mapstone
Mrs. Jedbury (his Wife): Kelly S. Taylor
Christopher Jedbury, Jr. (their Son): Tomas Peter
Nelly (their Daughter): Krista Zaleski
Whimper (their Man-servant): James R. Hedrick
Job (valet to Jedbury Junior): Greg Giordano
Major Hedway (a retired soldier): Adrian Stephens
Dora (his Niece): Jenn Broda
Mr. Glibb (President of the Association for Suppression of Juvenile Gambling): ToddHW
Mrs. Glibb (his better half): WendyKatzHiller
Tom Bellaby (a young Lawyer): TJ Burns
Mr. Simpson (Manager of the Bombay House): Anthony Joseph
Stage Directions: TR Love
Editing: Jenn Broda
